DOC.brief_title: Pre-Salpingo-Oophorectomy Pilot Study of MAKO 7 Device Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective, multi-center observational study to evaluate the ability of the MAKO 7 device to collect cells from the fallopian tubes for cytological evaluation for determination and/or differentiation of normal versus atypical versus malignant cells.
